name: Mending Limbo
description:
This game is loosely based on Dante's Inferno and the rings of hell. you are sent to the first ring of hell for the rest of eternity, but you uncover dark secrets and hidden truths behind the true god of the world.   

Music from https://modarchive.org/

most tiles from Park tileset by Horsten Vault and Usurper Ghoul tileset.
